column7: Intermediate dance technique and improvisation. For non-dance majors. May be repeated to a maximum of 8 hours. Prerequisite: DANC 101 or consent of instructor.
column9: May be repeated to a maximum of 8 hours. Prerequisite: DANC 101 or consent of instructor.
column11: Student costs for supplies and concert tickets: Approx. $30. Written assignments and concert attendance is required.
